designSystem.name: UI Component Design System
designSystem.description: A comprehensive design system for common UI components

modal.description: Modal/Dialog component for overlay content with backdrop variants, placement options, and state management

useDisclosure.description: React hook for managing modal open/close state

returns.onOpenChange: (isOpen: boolean) => void - Function to toggle modal

implementation.structure: Modal (wrapper + backdrop) → ModalContent → ModalHeader + ModalBody + ModalFooter
implementation.notes: Use render prop pattern with onClose callback for flexibility. Backdrop click and ESC key should close modal by default.

badge.description: Badge component for labels, status indicators, and notification counts

implementation.structure: Wrapper (relative) → Content (e.g., Avatar) + Badge (absolute with placement)
implementation.notes: For overlay badges, wrap target element in relative container and position badge absolutely using placement values

skeleton.description: Skeleton loading component with state-based visibility

implementation.structure: Skeleton wrapper with isLoaded prop to toggle between skeleton and actual content
implementation.notes: Use isLoaded prop to control visibility. When true, shows children; when false, shows skeleton placeholder.

card.description: Container component for grouping related content

radio.description: Radio button input component with group container support

implementation.structure: RadioGroup → Label + Description (optional) + Radio items container → Individual Radio components
implementation.notes: Use flexDirection to control horizontal vs vertical layout. Group handles state management for all radio buttons.

spotlightCard.description: Interactive card with mouse-tracking spotlight effect

spotlight.background: radial-gradient(600px circle at var(--mouse-x) var(--mouse-y), var(--spotlight-color), transparent 40%)

implementation.notes: Use CSS custom properties to track mouse position and apply radial gradient. Background should use: radial-gradient(600px circle at var(--mouse-x) var(--mouse-y), var(--spotlight-color), transparent 40%)

slider.description: Range slider input component with value indicator

implementation.notes: Use x prop for horizontal spacing, y prop for vertical spacing. Without props, spacer takes up available space (flex: 1)

switch.description: Toggle switch component for binary on/off states

progress.description: Progress bar component for displaying completion status

indicator.backgroundImage: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 50%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) 50%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) 75%, transparent 75%, transparent)

implementation.notes: Use value prop (0-100) for determinate progress. For indeterminate, animate the indicator. showValueLabel prop displays percentage or formatted value.

textarea.description: Multi-line text input component with auto-resize support

autoResize.notes: Use minRows and maxRows props to control auto-resize behavior. Calculate height based on scrollHeight.

listbox.description: List component for displaying selectable items with sections and multi-select support

implementation.notes: Support for icons (startContent/endContent), descriptions, sections with titles, dividers, and dynamic rendering

popover.description: Floating content container positioned relative to a trigger element

implementation.notes: Use floating-ui or similar for positioning. Support backdrop, arrow, and auto-positioning with collision detection.
Use @internationalized/date for date handling. Support range selection with start and end dates. Include visual feedback for hover, in-range, and selected states.

dropdown.description: Dropdown menu component with keyboard shortcuts, sections, and rich content support

implementation.notes: Support for keyboard shortcuts, icons, descriptions, sections, dividers, and dynamic rendering. Uses Popover/Listbox patterns.

avatar.description: Avatar component for user profile images with fallbacks and status indicators

implementation.notes: Support for image src, name fallback (initials), custom fallback icons, and showFallback prop for error handling

button.description: Button component with variants, colors, sizes, and icon support

buttonGroup.description: Container for grouping related buttons together

autocomplete.description: Searchable select component with filtering and custom value support

implementation.notes: Support for filtering, custom values (allowsCustomValue), async loading, sections, and keyboard navigation. Combine input field with dropdown menu.

numberInput.description: Numeric input component with step controls and min/max validation

implementation.notes: Support for min, max, step, formatOptions (currency, percent, etc.), increment/decrement buttons, keyboard navigation (arrow keys), and locale-aware number formatting

tabs.description: Tab navigation component for organizing content into separate views

implementation.notes: Support for keyboard navigation (arrow keys), controlled/uncontrolled state, icons in tabs, and animated cursor indicator

form.description: Form wrapper component with validation and submission handling

implementation.notes: HTML form element wrapper that handles validation, submission, and provides context for form fields. Use with native form validation or custom validate functions.

pagination.description: Pagination component for navigating through pages of content

implementation.notes: Support for controlled/uncontrolled state, siblings (number of pages shown), boundaries, keyboard navigation, and custom page rendering

scrollShadow.description: Container that displays shadows to indicate scrollable content

implementation.notes: Use scroll event listeners to detect scroll position and show/hide shadows accordingly. Support for vertical, horizontal, or both orientations.

listbox.description: List component for displaying selectable items with sections, icons, and descriptions

single.notes: Only one item can be selected at a time

multiple.notes: Multiple items can be selected, shows checkmarks

none.notes: Items cannot be selected, only trigger actions

implementation.notes: Support for icons (startContent/endContent), descriptions, sections with titles, dividers, and top content area. Use onAction for click handlers, onSelectionChange for selection.

popover.description: Floating content container triggered by user interaction

implementation.notes: Use placement prop for positioning. Supports backdrop variants. Auto-closes on outside click or ESC key.

rangeCalendar.description: Calendar component for selecting date ranges

implementation.notes: Uses @internationalized/date for date handling. Support for controlled/uncontrolled state, min/max dates, disabled dates, locale support.

dropdown.description: Dropdown menu component combining trigger and positioned menu content

implementation.notes: Positioned menu triggered by button/element click. Supports icons (startContent/endContent), descriptions, keyboard shortcuts, sections with titles, dividers. Closes on outside click, ESC key, or item selection. Inherits most styling from Listbox component.
